sourcesContent:
<template>
    <VueDatePicker v-model="date" auto-apply :format="dateFormat">

    </VueDatePicker>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    data() {
        return {
            date: Date,
            dateFormat:"MM/dd/yyyy"
        }
    },
    created() {
        this.dateFormat=this.formatDate(this.date);
    },
    methods: {
        formatDate(datetime) {
            datetime=new Date(datetime);
            const day = datetime.getDate();
            const month = datetime.getMonth() + 1;
            const year = datetime.getFullYear();

            return `${day}/${month}/${year}`;
        }
    }
}
</script>
<style scoped>
@import url('../../style/base/textfield.css');
</style>
